title: Create Linked File

params.name: name
params.desc: Required. The name of the file.

params.name: type
params.desc: Required. The integration type of the file (e.g. google, dropbox, box).

params.name: url
params.desc: Required. The URL of linked file.

params.name: content_type
params.desc: The content type of the image (e.g. txt/plain).

params.name: size
params.desc: The filesize, if the integration provided it.

params.name: story_id
params.desc: The ID of the linked story.

params.name: thumbnail_url
params.desc: The URL of the thumbnail, if the integration provided it.

params.name: uploader_id
params.desc: The UUID of the member that uploaded the file.

description: Create Linked File allows you to create a new Linked File in Clubhouse.
